channel.description: Recent content in SUSE Linux on about-virtualization.com

item.title: Linux Basic commands
item.description: SUSE Linux This article covers the pointers for setting up the linux test VM on home computer and basic Linux commands and their usage. Pointers for settings up the SUSE Linux in your home system Install Hyper V on your Windows 10 system Create an account for the SUSE Linux portal Download the ISO and generate the registration code on the SUSE portal While configuring the Linux guest, use the default virtual switch on hyper v , which would enable internet access on your guest OS
